---------------------------------------------------------------------
Release 1.0
---------------------------------------------------------------------

CHANGES:
* jQuery is not required anymore
* IE9 and IE10 are not supported anymore

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Release 0.3
---------------------------------------------------------------------
NEW FEATURES:
* jasmineFixtures.setCSS()
* jasmineFixtures.setHTML()

CHANGES:
* Removed direct invocation of afterEach, replaced with jasmine.getEnv().afterEach

---------------------------------------------------------------------
Release 0.2
---------------------------------------------------------------------
